title: The Mill on the Floss - use of the word "material"

content.question: In the third sentence of paragraph 1, the author uses the word "material" to form a connection between

choices.label: subjects for contemplation and cloth for sewing
a reformer's ideals and a miser's wealth
rewards in an afterlife and a conservative tradition
common sense and fabric for daily wear

content.answer: subjects for contemplation and cloth for sewing

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Distinguish between the literal and figurative meanings of words and phrases.
